name: Sweet Desire: Hentai Puzzle
description:
«Sweet Desire: Hentai Puzzle» is a game with a lot of hot NSFW anime arts!

Undress beautiful anime girls and find out what they hide under their clothes! Each girl gradually takes off her dress, skirt, blouse, and underwear. Complete all the levels to satisfy every hot girl.



This game is a pleasant entertainment after a long and difficult day. Relax and take pleasure! Girls will amuse you, and you won't notice how quickly time flies by!

Collect all pictures of beautiful anime girls and enjoy!
